anchors.text: The PRDGenerator is the knowledge synthesizer of Orchestr8, transforming code structure and relationships into human-readable documentation and specifications. While the ConnectionVerifier validates relationships and the ConnectionGraph visualizes them, the PRDGenerator interprets these relationships to generate meaningful documentation that bridges technical implementation with product understanding.

The PRDGenerator component transforms the documentation process from a manual, error-prone task to an automated, intelligent system that keeps documentation in sync with code. By generating high-quality documentation directly from project analysis, it bridges the gap between technical implementation and product understanding.
1. Documentation is essential but often neglected due to time constraints
